original_text: Therefore they turned their backs before the men of Israel unto the way of the wilderness; but the battle overtook them; and them which came out of the cities they destroyed in the midst of them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람 앞에서 몸을 돌려 광야 길로 향하였으나 군사가 급히 추격하며 각 성읍에서 나온 자를 그 가운데에서 진멸하니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore they turned their backs before the men of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 이스라엘 사람들 앞에서 등을 돌렸다

sentences.original_text: unto the way of the wilderness
and them which came out of the cities
they destroyed in the midst of them
